meanings.definition: spitzes (verb): third person singular present of spitz
meanings.sent1: She spitzes the ball into the goal.
meanings.sent2: He always spitzes his coffee with sugar.
meanings.sent3: The cat spitzes the yarn all over the room.
meanings.sent4: The chef spitzes the dish with a sprinkle of herbs.
meanings.sent5: The gardener spitzes the flowers with water every morning.

meanings.sent1: They have two spitzes as pets.
meanings.sent2: The spitzes in the park were playing happily.
meanings.sent3: The spitzes in the competition were all fluffy and cute.
meanings.sent4: The spitzes in the shelter were looking for forever homes.
meanings.sent5: The spitzes in the show had shiny coats and bright eyes.
